What is this message? Who is 715? What is 'careful with those,' supposed to mean?

Your curiosity has been churned and you're eager to learn more. You tell Rah to keep the radio on. Rah agrees with you, just as curious.

But this sounds almost like it could be dangerous. Do you know enough? Is it necessary to talk to someone about this? Could it just be some random people goofing around? Part of this seems all too serious, and you wonder if getting someone else involved is a good idea.

Go home and be cautious.Sleep at Rah's to keep listening
